properties.name: goodfellaz17.delivery.time-multiplier
properties.description: Multiplier for delivery time simulation. 720x = 72 hours â†’ 6 minutes.

properties.name: goodfellaz17.delivery.target-task-size
properties.description: Target number of plays per task.

properties.name: goodfellaz17.delivery.orphan-threshold-seconds
properties.description: Seconds after which an EXECUTING task is considered orphaned.

properties.name: goodfellaz17.delivery.retry-backoff-base-seconds
properties.description: Base seconds for exponential retry backoff.

properties.name: goodfellaz17.worker.batch-size
properties.description: Number of tasks to process per worker cycle.

properties.name: goodfellaz17.refund.enabled
properties.description: Enable refunds on permanent task failures.

properties.name: goodfellaz17.chaos.available
properties.description: Whether chaos injection endpoints are available.

properties.name: goodfellaz17.chaos.auto-disable-after-minutes
properties.description: Auto-disable chaos injection after N minutes.

properties.name: goodfellaz17.production-guards.enforce-real-timing
properties.description: Enforce real timing in production (no time compression).

properties.name: goodfellaz17.production-guards.block-chaos-injection
properties.description: Block chaos injection endpoints in production.

properties.name: bot.accounts.farm-size
properties.description: Size of the Spotify account farm.

properties.name: app.proxy.base-url
properties.description: Base URL for proxy executor service.

properties.name: app.proxy.timeout-ms
properties.description: Timeout for proxy requests in milliseconds.

properties.name: app.scheduler.batch-size
properties.description: Number of tasks per scheduler batch.
